    "number": 165683,
    "data": "7,19,61,127,331,2437,2791,5419,8269,10267,13267,23497,35317,55897,73477,89269,115837,170647,292969,360187,372769,452797,603457,812761,895987,929077,976411,997057,1074607,1125469,1253887,1372957,1609669,1653919",
    "name": "Primes of form 3*p*(p-1)+1 with p also a prime.",
    "link": [
        "Vincenzo Librandi, <a href=\"/A165683/b165683.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000</a>"
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = x^3-(x-1)^3 where x = A165682(n)."
    ],
    "example": [
        "a(3)= 61=3*5*(5-1)+1 generated by p=3. a(4)=127=3*7*(7-1)+1 generated by p=7. a(5)=331=3*11*(11-1)+1."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Select[Table[3 p (p - 1) + 1, {p, Prime[Range[100]]}], PrimeQ] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 13 2013 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) [a: p in PrimesUpTo(1000) | IsPrime(a) where a is 3*p*(p-1)+1]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 13 2013 *"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A165681, A165682."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,easy",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 24 2009",
    "ext": [
        "7 and 19 inserted by _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 26 2009"
    ],
    "references": 3,
    "revision": 12,
    "time": "2013-09-13T10:50:51-04:00",
    "created": "2010-06-01T03:00:00-04:00"
}
